helpDescription: Change settings for rewards earned upon leveling up.
helpUsage: Set role to be given when a member reaches the specified level.```/rewards add <level> <role>```
Remove role from be given at a specified level.```/rewards remove <level>```
Set roles to be stacked or replaced after gaining new role.```/rewards stack <enable/disable>```
Shows all roles set to levels.```/rewards show```
notExists: Unable to find a reward for level %s.
stackText: All text rewards will now be stacked.
replaceText: All text rewards will now be replaced.
stackVoice: All voice rewards will now be stacked.
replaceVoice: All voice rewards will now be replaced.
limit: Too many roles have been set up. Currently only 25 role rewards can be setup.
badgeInvalidName: Unable to find a badge with the id `%s`.
voiceBadgeAdded: Badge with name `%s` will be rewarded to user when they reach voice level %s.
badgeAdded: Badge with name `%s` will be rewarded to user when they reach text level %s.
invalidLevel: Unable to find a reward set for level `%s`.
voiceBadgeRemoved: Badge reward for level `%s` has been removed from voice leveling.
badgeRemoved: Badge reward for level `%s` has been removed from text leveling.
voiceExpAdded: User will earn `%s` experience when they reach voice level %s.
expAdded: User will earn `%s` experience when they reach text level %s.
voiceExpRemoved: Experience reward for level `%s` has been removed from voice leveling.
expRemoved: Experience reward for level `%s` has been removed from text leveling.
voiceRoleAdded: User will earn %s role when they reach voice level %s.
roleAdded: User will earn %s role when they reach text level %s.
voiceRoleRemoved: Role reward for level `%s` has been removed from voice leveling.
roleRemoved: Role reward for level `%s` has been removed from text leveling.
